title: Album Page, "Double Arcade in one of the Smaller Courts of the Hospital, Milan", September 8, 1888
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on off-white textured wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, bottom right corner (inscribed in circle, perpendicular to drawing) 92.  Other inscriptions clockwise from upper right margin: (inscribed on ruled line) Double Arcade in one of / the Smaller Courts of the / Hospital / Milan / September 8th 1888; 2.38 / Plan / scale 0.02 = 1 M/ A - Line of Section - B; The Terra cotta work around arches consists of suite of canthus [acanthus] leaves on moulding like this - .
description: Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding.  Depicted is the elevation of a double arcade supported by Corinthian columns.  The bottom right corner of the sheet illustrates a plan of three of these arcaded bays with columnar supports, and the artist has inscribed a note about the distance between them.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Double Arcade in one of the Smaller Courts of the Hospital, Milan", September 8, 1888.
September 8, 1888. Brush and watercolor, graphite on off-white textured wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-162.
